name: js-users
description: - Fork this project. - Commit the important milestones and not just the final result. - Go with the exercises step by step - Use those tools you can work the the quickest, the more effective with. - Write a code what you don’t mind to present and you’re not lost in it. - If you face a barrier or don’t understand something – try to find the right 	solution – be creative and independent. - If you really get stuck ask for help, but in this case define your question 	thoroughly/exactly. - Cover your code with test cases wherever you can.
